data.title: Darren Appleton
data.meta_description: I just heard Darren Appleton has had a heart attack and is in a coma in a hospital. Can anyone verify?
data.text:
induced coma for few days till stabilized..

Shane Appleton's words:

Just to let people know Darren had a massive heart attack on monday.hes in a critical condition but stable at mo.hes responding well to treatment at moment.they have had to put him in a induced coma.next couple of days will be key.hes improving everyday so that's good sign.thanks to everyone who's messaged us we are very great full.we will keep u all updated on his progress.also at the moment visiting is family only i know alot would like to visit him,when more can visit him I'll let you know.keep praying for Darren to make a full recovery.

Merry Christmas All..

This From Shane Appleton:

The best Christmas Day is just happening Darren Appleton coming of sedation slowly today, he’s had ventilator tubes pulled out today! He’s trying to talk, still very confused and little aggravated at times but he was saying my name,saying sorry to my dad bless him he was asking about Dyno and Gigi and he even wanted to try to get up saying he doesn’t wanna sleep. It seems like he knows something has happened to him. Few very crucial days coming up when sedation will be wearing off let’s keep praying for his good health and Merry Christmas to you all!

Merry Christmas All..

This From Shane Appleton:

The best Christmas Day is just happening Darren Appleton coming of sedation slowly today, he’s had ventilator tubes pulled out today! He’s trying to talk, still very confused and little aggravated at times but he was saying my name,saying sorry to my dad bless him he was asking about Dyno and Gigi and he even wanted to try to get up saying he doesn’t wanna sleep. It seems like he knows something has happened to him. Few very crucial days coming up when sedation will be wearing off let’s keep praying for his good health and Merry Christmas to you all!

Very encouraging news! Thanks for keeping us updated and best wishes and prayers for Darren’s continued recovery!

In From Shane Appleton:

quick update on darren.better day today and improvement.so they have been bringing him out of sedation through out the day.hes still very confused and trying to pull stuff out,but they said this is normal.also when i was with him he full woke he did respond to some commands from doctor which is a good sign.they will try again tomorrow now.still hell of a long way to go but a positive day i think.thanks again for the kind messages and posts, darren has a lot of love and this will help to get him through this.

Shane,

Thank you very much for the update. We are all with you and Darren.

Will Prout

Here's the latest:

The best Christmas Day is just happening Darren Appleton coming of sedation slowly today, he’s had ventilator tubes pulled out today! He’s trying to talk, still very confused and little aggravated at times but he was saying his brothers name, he was asking about Dyno and Gigi and he even wanted to try to get up saying he doesn’t wanna sleep. Few very crucial days coming up when sedation will be wearing off let’s keep praying for his good health and Merry Christmas to you all!
